list.en: I have a complaint to make.
How many times do I have to tell you?
You all talk and no action.
That's easy for you to say.
Would you mind keeping it down?
I'm out of patience with you.
Why are you picking on me?
list.cn: 你为什么要找我的麻烦?

list.en: It was a waste of effort.
I expected it to be much better.
I've never been so mad in my life.
list.cn: 我这辈子从没这么生气过。

list.en: You're going to be the death of me.
I've stood as much as I can.
You really make my blood boil?
What makes you think I care?
I don't mind in the slightest.
Do you have any seat preferences, sir?
list.cn: 先生，您对座位有什么偏好吗?

list.en: Would you prefer milk or coffee?
I generally find flying is more interesting than going by sea.
list.cn: 我通常觉得坐飞机比坐船更有趣。

list.en: I think this book is greatly inferior to that one.
list.cn: 我认为这本书比那本书差得多。

list.en: Your voice is more attractive than his.
list.cn: 你的声音比他的更有吸引力。

list.en: I consider it to be inferior to computers.
I think cotton has the edge of.
I think cotton has the edge on dacron.
Tom is more diligent than other students.
list.cn: 汤姆比其他学生更勤奋。

list.en: On the whole, this one is better.
I'm not at all pleased by your negligence.
list.cn: 我对你的疏忽一点也不满意。

list.en: Can't you be serious for once?
How can you do such a foolish thing?
list.cn: 你怎么能做这么愚蠢的事?

list.en: You'd better mind your own business.
Could you be more polite next time?
list.cn: 下次你能不能礼貌一点?

list.en: You might at least have avoided doing that.
list.cn: 你至少可以避免那样做。

list.en: I wonder why you couldn't have told me earlier.
list.cn: 我想知道你为什么不能早点告诉我。

list.en: I feel pity for this old woman.
I'm sorry to hear the news.
list.cn: 听到这个消息我很难过。

list.en: I do feel sorry for her.
You must have gone through a lot.
I do feel sorry for him.
I do hope it's nothing serious.
list.cn: 我希望不是什么严重的问题。

list.en: I agree with you on this point.
list.cn: 在这一点上我同意你的看法。
那完全是我自己的主意。

list.en: That's just what I was going to say.
I certainly agree on this opinion.
I'm quite pleased with your work.
I'm quite pleased with your arrangement.
How I wish I hadn't done that.
I'm sorry to have missed the chances.
list.cn: 我很抱歉错过了这些机会。

list.en: I really screwed up this time.
It was too late now to regret.
I'm Fed up with your words.
Her gossip really bores me stiff.
It gave me a real pain in the neck.
I don't want to hear it.
I'm Fed up with this work.
I didn't mean it that way.
I really don't know how to express how sorry I am.
list.cn: 我真的不知道该如何表达我的歉意。

list.en: I throw myself upon your mercy.
You fry in the life out of me.
You scared the wits out of me.
It set my teeth on edge.
I'm too excited to go to sleep.
I'm as happy as I can be.
I'm too excited to say a word.
I'm on top of the world.
This is too good to be true.
I'm in a great mood today.
I'm really in a flap about the interview.
list.cn: 关于面试，我真的很紧张。

list.en: I find his illness very worrying.
list.cn: 我觉得他的病很令人担忧。

list.en: I really don't know what I shall do.
I really don't know what to do.
list.cn: 我真的不知道该怎么办。

list.en: I have no doubt about that.
I have great belief in his ability.
list.cn: 我对他的能力很有信心。

list.en: I find it hard to believe.
I'll believe it when I see it.
Don't expect me to believe you.
